AcceptApproveCommand.title: AcceptApproveCommand
AcceptApproveCommand.summary: Approves the request to run a single command.

AddHostsToGroup.title: AddHostsToGroup
AddHostsToGroup.summary: Adds one or more hosts to the specified host group.

AddUsersToGroup.title: AddUsersToGroup
AddUsersToGroup.summary: Add one or more users to a user group.

AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey.title: AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey
AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey.summary: Associates host accounts with a shared key.

AttachHostAccountsToUser.title: AttachHostAccountsToUser
AttachHostAccountsToUser.summary: Authorizes a user to manage the hosts and host accounts.

AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup.title: AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup
AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup.summary: Authorizes a user group to manage one or more hosts and host accounts.

AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser.title: AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser
AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser.summary: Authorizes a user to manage one or more host groups and host accounts.

AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup.title: AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup
AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup.summary: Authorizes a user to manage one or more host groups and host accounts.

ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups.title: ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups
ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups.summary: Configures security groups for a bastion host.

ConfigInstanceWhiteList.title: ConfigInstanceWhiteList
ConfigInstanceWhiteList.summary: The region ID of the bastion host.

CreateHost.title: CreateHost
CreateHost.summary: Creates a host for O\\\&M in the specified bastion host.

CreateHostAccount.title: CreateHostAccount
CreateHostAccount.summary: Creates a host account for a host.

CreateUser.title: CreateUser
CreateUser.summary: Adds a user to a bastion host.

CreateUserGroup.title: CreateUserGroup
CreateUserGroup.summary: Creates a user group for the specified bastion host.

CreateUserPublicKey.title: CreateUserPublicKey
CreateUserPublicKey.summary: Creates a public key for the specified user.

DeleteUser.title: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.summary: Deletes a specified user from a specified bastion host.

DeleteUserGroup.title: DeleteUserGroup
DeleteUserGroup.summary: Deletes a specified user group from a specified bastion host.

DeleteUserPublicKey.title: DeleteUserPublicKey
DeleteUserPublicKey.summary: Deletes a public key from the specified user.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the attribute information about the specified bastion host. The information includes the ID and remarks of the bastion host.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries available regions where you can create bastion hosts.

DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey.title: DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey
DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey.summary: Disassociates host accounts from a shared key.

DetachHostAccountsFromUser.title: DetachHostAccountsFromUser
DetachHostAccountsFromUser.summary: Revokes the permissions on one or more hosts and host accounts from a user.

DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup.title: DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup
DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup.summary: Revokes the permissions on one or more hosts and host accounts from a user group.

DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser.title: DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser
DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser.summary: Revokes permissions on one or more host groups and host accounts from a user.

DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup.title: DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup
DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup.summary: Revokes permissions on one or more host groups and host accounts from a user group.

DisableInstancePublicAccess.title: DisableInstancePublicAccess
DisableInstancePublicAccess.summary: Disables Internet access for a bastion host.

EnableInstancePublicAccess.title: EnableInstancePublicAccess
EnableInstancePublicAccess.summary: Enables Internet access for a bastion host.

GetHost.title: GetHost
GetHost.summary: Queries the details of a specified host, such as the name, source, endpoint, protocol, and service port of the host.

GetHostAccount.title: GetHostAccount
GetHostAccount.summary: Queries the details of a specified host account.

GetHostGroup.title: GetHostGroup
GetHostGroup.summary: Queries the details of a specified host group.

GetHostShareKey.title: GetHostShareKey
GetHostShareKey.summary: Queries the details of a shared key.

GetInstanceADAuthServer.title: GetInstanceADAuthServer
GetInstanceADAuthServer.summary: Queries the settings of Active Directory (AD) authentication on a bastion host.

GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer.title: GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer
GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer.summary: Queries the settings of Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) authentication on a bastion host.

GetInstanceTwoFactor.title: GetInstanceTwoFactor
GetInstanceTwoFactor.summary: Queries the settings of two-factor authentication on a bastion host.

GetUser.title: GetUser
GetUser.summary: Queries the details of a user of the specified bastion host.

GetUserGroup.title: GetUserGroup
GetUserGroup.summary: Queries the details of a user group in a bastion host.

ListHostAccounts.title: ListHostAccounts
ListHostAccounts.summary: Queries accounts of a specified host.

ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey.title: ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey
ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey.summary: Queries the host accounts that are associated with a shared key.

ListHostAccountsForUser.title: ListHostAccountsForUser
ListHostAccountsForUser.summary: Queries the host accounts that the specified user is authorized to manage on the specified host.

ListHostAccountsForUserGroup.title: ListHostAccountsForUserGroup
ListHostAccountsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the host accounts of the specified host that the specified user group is authorized to manage.

ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser.title: ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser
ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser.summary: Queries the names of the host accounts that a specified user is authorized to manage in a specified host group.

ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup.title: ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup
ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup.summary: Queries the names of the host accounts that a user group is authorized to manage in a host group.

ListHostGroups.title: ListHostGroups
ListHostGroups.summary: Queries host groups in a specified bastion host.

ListHostGroupsForUser.title: ListHostGroupsForUser
ListHostGroupsForUser.summary: Queries the host groups that a specified user is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListHostGroupsForUserGroup.title: ListHostGroupsForUserGroup
ListHostGroupsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the hosts that a specified user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListHostShareKeys.title: ListHostShareKeys
ListHostShareKeys.summary: Queries the shared keys that are associated with a host.

ListHosts.title: ListHosts
ListHosts.summary: Queries the hosts in a bastion host.

ListHostsForUser.title: ListHostsForUser
ListHostsForUser.summary: Queries the hosts that a user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListHostsForUserGroup.title: ListHostsForUserGroup
ListHostsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the hosts that a user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListOperationTickets.title: ListOperationTickets
ListOperationTickets.summary: Queries O\\\&M applications to be reviewed.

ListTagKeys.title: ListTagKeys
ListTagKeys.summary: Queries the tags that are added to a resource.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags bound to one or more Bastionhost instances.

ListUserGroups.summary: Queries the user groups on the specified bastion host.

ListUserPublicKeys.summary: Queries all public keys of the specified user.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Queries the users of a specified Bastionhost instance.

LockUsers.title: LockUsers
LockUsers.summary: Locks one or more users of a bastion host.

ModifyHost.title: ModifyHost
ModifyHost.summary: Modifies information about a host. The information includes the address, name, and description of the host and the operating system that the host runs.

ModifyHostAccount.title: ModifyHostAccount
ModifyHostAccount.summary: Modifies the information about a specified host account, such as the name, password, and private key.

ModifyHostGroup.title: ModifyHostGroup
ModifyHostGroup.summary: Modifies the name or description of the specified host group.

ModifyHostShareKey.title: ModifyHostShareKey
ModifyHostShareKey.summary: Modifies the information about a shared key.

ModifyHostsActiveAddressType.title: ModifyHostsActiveAddressType
ModifyHostsActiveAddressType.summary: Changes the portal type of one or more hosts for O\&M.

ModifyHostsPort.title: ModifyHostsPort
ModifyHostsPort.summary: Changes the port for the O\\\\\\&M protocol on one or more hosts.

ModifyInstanceADAuthServer.title: ModifyInstanceADAuthServer
ModifyInstanceADAuthServer.summary: Modifies the settings of Active Directory (AD) authentication on a bastion host.

ModifyInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAttribute
ModifyInstanceAttribute.summary: Modifies the information about the specified bastion host.

ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer.title: ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer
ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer.summary: Modifies the settings of Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) authentication on a bastion host.

ModifyInstanceTwoFactor.title: ModifyInstanceTwoFactor
ModifyInstanceTwoFactor.summary: Modifies the settings of two-factor authentication on a bastion host.

ModifyUser.title: ModifyUser
ModifyUser.summary: Modifies the information about a Bastionhost user.

ModifyUserGroup.title: ModifyUserGroup
ModifyUserGroup.summary: Modifies the information about the specified user group.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a bastion host from one resource group to another resource group.

RejectApproveCommand.title: RejectApproveCommand
RejectApproveCommand.summary: Rejects the request to run a single command.

RemoveHostsFromGroup.title: RemoveHostsFromGroup
RemoveHostsFromGroup.summary: Removes one or more hosts from a host group.

RemoveUsersFromGroup.title: RemoveUsersFromGroup
RemoveUsersFromGroup.summary: Removes one or more users from a user group.

ResetHostAccountCredential.title: ResetHostAccountCredential
ResetHostAccountCredential.summary: Deletes the logon credential of a specified host account of a specified Bastionhost instance. The logon credential can be the password or SSH private key.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to specified bastion hosts.

UnlockUsers.title: UnlockUsers
UnlockUsers.summary: Unlocks one or more users of a bastion host.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from the specified bastion host and deletes the tags at a time.
